MultiEWCE

Authors: Robert Gordon-Smith, Brian M. Schilder, Nathan G .Skene

Most recent update: Nov-15-2021

MultiEWCE

R package for analysing multiple gene lists in parallel using EWCE.

Installation

Within R:

if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
if (!require("MultiEWCE")) remotes::install_github("neurogenomics/MultiEWCE")

Documentation website.

Package website

checkout the website to get started - MultiEWCE.
